titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale College Student Records Concerning Attendance, Residence, and Discipline
Yale College Student Records Concerning Attendance, Residence, and Discipline
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:07

did.unittitle: Yale College student records concerning attendance, residence, and discipline

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative files, reports, and correspondence documenting activities and the operations of the Yale College registrar. Included are student files and grade books, entrance cards, room assignments, and attendance records.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 9-F (YRG 9-F), Yale College student records.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access is partially restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale College Student Records Concerning Academics, Attendance, Residence, and Discipline (RU 208). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative files, reports, and correspondence documenting activities and the operations of the Yale College registrar. Included are student files and grade books, entrance cards, room assignments, and attendance records.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Bound volume noting commencement appointments such as valedictorians and orators and winners of scholarships and awards.
